name: CONNECTED_FOUND
text: A peer connected but we already had a ledger entry for it.

name: CONNECTED_NOT_FOUND
text: A peer connected and we did not yet have a ledger entry for it.

name: DISCONNECTED_FOUND
text: A peer disconnected and we had a ledger entry for it, which we now deleted.

name: DISCONNECTED_NOT_FOUND
text: A peer disconnected but we did not have a ledger entry for it.
